latest_revision.comment: /* add 'Where to find HeatSync Labs' */ new section
latest_revision.text:
I know that most of this content is in the FAQs. People seem to not be finding it. So this is an attempt to make a few key pieces more easily available.

== add 'Where to find HeatSync Labs' ==

For someone looking at the new to HeatSync page perhaps giving a physical address, prefer newcomers enter through front doors, maybe even typical hours for public access or a link to the calendar with a comment that weekday evenings are often but not always open check calendar for specific details. Possibly mention public parking lot in back and Metro line runs right in font with near by stops.
